p: The organs harvested for histopathology and immunohistochemistry were fixed in 10% buffered formalin and processed for histopathology and immunohistochemistry (IHC) as previously described [ 18]. Heads were collected from the group injected IC with WNV/BgV-prME, while head, spine, heart, lungs, spleen, liver, and kidney were harvested from mice inoculated with BgV C-CG, BgV T-AT, BgV C-CG/WNV-prME and BgV T-AT/WNV-prME, on days 3, 5 and 22 p.i..
